channel.title: Multi-Agent systems on Srinidhi Hegde
channel.description: Recent content in Multi-Agent systems on Srinidhi Hegde

item.title: Distributed Fault Tolerant Multi-Robot Area Coverage Under Limited Communication Ranges
item.description: This work develops a distributed fault tolerant area coverage algorithm, resulting in quick detection of the faulty agent under limited communication constraints and redistributes the area without conflicts.
